short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly view and track the count of pending tasks in your GitLab to-do list directly from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GitLab Task Ticker is a Chrome/Edge extension designed for active developers and teams who use GitLab as their primary platform for project and code management. This extension allows users to instantly view the number of pending tasks in their GitLab To-Do list, ensuring fast access and response to new tasks, Merge Requests, and code comments.

Features:
- Real-Time Updates: The extensions refreshes the count of pending tasks periodically based on your preferences set in the options menu, ensuring that you always have the most current information at a glance.
- Customizable Settings: Easily adjust the frequency of updates from the extension’s options page for your workflow.
- Idle Detection: Smart idle detection ensures that the extension does not make unnecessary API requests when your computer is locked or when you're away, reducing data usage and server load.
- Quick Access: Clicking the extension icon, when you are on a new tab page, it navigates directly to your tasks in GitLab, simplifying task management.

Security and Privacy:
Access to your GitLab tasks is secured through a personal access token with minimal necessary permissions (read_api), ensuring a high level of data security and privacy.

For developers who rely on GitLab for project management and code reviews, staying on top of your tasks can be a hassle. GitLab Task Ticker simplifies this by bringing your to-do list to you. No more switching tabs or logging in multiple times a day — just a simple, effective way to stay informed and focused on your work. Ideal for anyone looking to streamline their workflow and cut down on the clutter of daily tasks.

GitLab Task Ticker is perfect for developers who want to stay on top of their tasks in GitLab without distractions. The extension not only saves time but also enhances work efficiency by speeding up the processing of Merge Requests and Code Reviews. All this makes your work more organized and less stressful.
